network-modal.warning: Warning: This information will be saved to your local storage, make sure your computer is secure.

tokens.warning-offline: Can't load balances in offline mode

error.decimals: Invalid Decimal. Decimal can only be between 0 and 18.

logout-warning: It seems like you forgot to logout your wallet. For your wallet security, please log out your wallet to continue, or go back to your wallet.
investigate: Use the transaction hash to investigate why this transaction failed.
mewconnect-disconnected: Seems like you are disconnected from MEWconnect, please reconnect using the App.
enterPhoneForSMS: Please enter your mobile phone number.  This number is used for verification via a SMS message code.
verifyCodeInstructions: You will receive a 6 digit verification code via SMS.  This may take a few moments.  Once you receive this 6 digit verification code please enter it below.
CryptoToFiatBeta: Please note Crypto to Fiat is currently a beta feature of Bity
dashboardSwap: MEW has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
